content.text:
[@masukomi](@LzTjF5eAVC6xprPMGeNzqEP/EEBIGpM6hDaaY10hrz8=.ed25519)

> QUERTY

This sounds like the name of a prank keyboard layout meant to sound like "QWERTY" you can spring on unsuspecting friends.

- "What keyboard layout is this?"
- "QUERTY"
- "No it isn't, all the keys are in the wrong spots"
- "It's definitely QUERTY, see? Q U E R T Y"

I'm getting [fourwordsalluppercase](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bLE7zsJk4AI) vibes.
